bibl.title: Axapes, a Basilikos Grammateus and the Machimoi.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: OATES, John F.

bibl.note: A certain Axapes appears in two Zenon texts, P. Cair. Zen. IV 59590 and P. Mich. I 82. Attempts a general reconstruction of the situation from the information in the two texts together.
OATES John F., Axapes, a Basilikos Grammateus and the Machimoi.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 588-592.
145.4 P. Cairo Zenon IV, 59590 P. Mich. I, 82
